com.gv.cataloguer.authenthication.dao

Interface UserDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserDaoSingleton

    public interface UserDao
    This interface provides methods for accessing data storage with information about users @see User

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllUserEmails()
      retrieves all email addresses of registered users from data storage
      java.lang.Object[] getLastUpdateAndTraffic(int userId)
      searches and returns two-sized array of Objects of default users values of last added files and its size from data storage
      User getUser(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String password)
      searches and returns User object @see User according password and login that stored in data storage
      void setLastUpdateAndTraffic(int userId, java.util.Date newLastUpdate, int newTraffic)
      Sets new lastUpdate date and used traffic in megabytes in data storage

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        User getUser(java.lang.String login,
             java.lang.String password)
      throws java.sql.SQLException,
             java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        searches and returns User object @see User according password and login that stored in data storage
        Parameters:
        login - - users login property
        password - - users password property, stored only in data storage
        Returns:
        User object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - - if there are troubles in SQL logic
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - - if database driver is not loaded

      • getAllUserEmails

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllUserEmails()
        retrieves all email addresses of registered users from data storage
        Returns:
        list of users emails in String objects

      • getLastUpdateAndTraffic

        java.lang.Object[] getLastUpdateAndTraffic(int userId)
        searches and returns two-sized array of Objects of default users values of last added files and its size from data storage
        Parameters:
        userId - - primary key of registered user
        Returns:
        two-sized array of Objects, first element of array - java.sql.Date object, second - added traffic in megabytes

      • setLastUpdateAndTraffic

        void setLastUpdateAndTraffic(int userId,
                             java.util.Date newLastUpdate,
                             int newTraffic)
        Sets new lastUpdate date and used traffic in megabytes in data storage
        Parameters:
        userId - - primary key of registered user
        newLastUpdate - - date of last added files
        newTraffic - - used traffic in megabytes
